titleStmt.title: Two sermons preached at Cambridge the first at the Lent assizes, 1654, the other on the yearly commemoration of Dr. Andrew Pern, 1655 / by J. Clerk.
titleStmt.author: Clarke, Joshua.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the printers to the Universitie and are to be sold by William Mordens,

notesStmt.note: Each sermon has separate t.p. and paging.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
